title: Separate kitchen shall not be necessary
clause_text: Separate kitchen shall not be necessary. Cooking space (alcove) shall be allowed without any minimum size restrictions. Where a kitchen is provided, the minimum area shall be 5.0 Sq.m. provided the width shall be at least 1.5 m.
section: Relaxation in Building and Other Requirements

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
